 			00000000:00000000       nop
 			00000001:00000000
 			00000010:00000000	nop
 			00000011:00000000
 start:			00000100:01110000	in		r0   //set the switches on the bord to 4'hF
			00000101:00000000
			00000110:11100000	store		r0,add_nand
			00000111:11111111
			00001000:11110000	loadimm		r0,7
			00001001:00000111
			00001010:11100000	store		r0,counter
			00001011:00011111
			00001100:11110000	loadimm 	r0,FF
			00001101:11111111
			00001110:11110100	loadimm		r1,FF
			00001111:11111111
loop:			00010000:01010000	shr		r0
			00010001:00000000
			00010010:01000100	shl		r1
			00010011:00000000
			00010100:10001100	mov		r3,r0 		
			00010101:00000000
			00010110:11010000	load		r0,add_nand
			00010111:11111111
			00011000:01010000	shr		r0
			00011001:00000000
			00011010:11100000	store		r0,add_nand
			00011011:11111111
			00011100:10000011	mov		r0,r3		
			00011101:00000000
			00011110:10100000	brz		nand: 
			00011111:00100100
			00100000:00010001	add		r0,r1        
			00100001:00000000
			00100010:10010000	br		out_add_nand	    
			00100011:00100110
nand:			00100100:00110001	nand		r0,r1	
			00100101:00000000
out_add_nand:		00100110:01100000	out		r0
			00100111:00000000
			00101000:10110000	br.sub          count_decrement_subroutine
			00101001:00110100
			00101010:10000011	mov		r0,r3		
			00101011:00000000
			00101100:10101000	brn		out
			00101101:00110000
			00101110:10010000	br		loop      
			00101111:00010000
out:			00110000:10010000	br		start
			00110001:00000100
			00110010:00000000	noop
			00110011:00000000


count_decrement_subroutine:

			00110100:11010000	load		r0,counter
			00110101:00011111
			00110110:10001001	mov		r2,r1		
			00110111:00000000
			00111000:11110100	loadimm		r1,1
			00111001:00000001
			00111010:00100001	sub		r0,r1
			00111011:00000000
			00111100:11100000	store		r0,counter
			00111101:00011111
			00111110:10000110	mov		r1,r2		
			00111111:00000000
			01000000:11000000       return
			01000001:00000000
